heading: Book a video call and get online treatment
text: Mediquince, an app for your health, provides high-quality video calls to enhance the patient experience. Mediquince offers exclusive offline and online treatment, easy OP consulting, video call booking through its top-notch out-patient portal.

heading: Create your medical profile, control everything
text: Impress your patients with a seamless experience. from check-in to follow-ups, provide top-notch service that keeps them comming back.

heading: A Complete online in & outpatient treatment app
text: Mediquince has been designed for it seamless doctor management of operations, patient care, and Hospital administrative tasks.

heading: Future of Medical Industry Need Us
text: It has offered me a platform to serve more and more patients by providing online consultations to patients. It is very user-friendly and delivers a better patient experience.
